defaults.description: Specify new default prop values for components. Keep in mind that this will be merged with previously defined values.
defaults.description_zh: 为组件指定新的缺省属性值。请记住，这将与先前定义的值合并。

disabled.description: Turns off all calculations of new default values for improved performance in situations where defaults propagation isn’t necessary.
disabled.description_zh: 关闭所有新默认值的计算，以便在不需要默认传播的情况下提高性能。

reset.description: Reset the default values up the nested chain by {n} amount.
reset.description_zh: 将嵌套链上的默认值重置为 {n} 个数量。

root.description: Force current defaults to match the application root defaults.
root.description_zh: 强制当前默认值与应用程序根默认值匹配。

scoped.description: Prevents the ability for default values to be inherited from parent components.
scoped.description_zh: 阻止从父组件继承默认值的功能。
